Actions.Name: Elemental Smite
Actions.Effects: Foe must save or become slowed.

Actions.Name: Soar
Actions.Description: Fly up to 6 spaces in a straight line.

Actions.Name: Swirling Elements
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 are teleported 1. Slowed or Blinded foes are teleported 2 instead.

Actions.Name: Raging Storm
Actions.Description: The Elemental creates an elemental storm in range 3, a 1 space terrain effect. Elementals have evasion and permanent stealth inside the area. The area is dangerous terrain for all other characters and other characters are blinded+ while in the area. At the end of the round, all storms grow to a blast 1 area, or increase their blast size by +1, to a maximum of 3. Up to two storms can be active at once.

Interrupts.Name: Reform
Interrupts.Trigger: The Elemental is damaged by an ability and the ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Sink into Elements
Actions.Description: The Elemental disperses into pure elements, removing it from the battlefield, then converges, placing it back on any space on the battlefield.
